.. _upcoming-events:

Upcoming Training Events
=========================

NCI plans to provide data training at the following events:

GEOHACK, 2-4 Nov, 2019
+++++++++++++++++++++++++

NCI will host GeoHACK onsite in the first weekend of Nov. Details will be posted at a closer date to the event.

ALCS, 5 Nov, 2019
+++++++++++++++++++++++++

ALCS19, Australian Leadership Computing Symposium 2019

NCI will provide a one-day high performance data training workshop. 

Tickets for ALCS2019 now available!

Registrations are now open for the inaugural Australasian Leadership Computing Symposium, 
taking place at the Australian Academy of Science in Canberra from the 6th to the 8th of November. 
For all the event details and registration information, click `here`_.

.. _here: https://opus.nci.org.au/display/Help/Australasian+Leadership+Computing+Symposium+2019

NCI general user training info: https://opus.nci.org.au/display/Help/User+Training+2019

For more information, please contact NCI help desk at help@nci.org.au.

Australian Climate and Water Summer Institute, early 2020
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Early 2020. Dates and places are to be determined, stay tune...
